backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence file listing implemented features, linked source files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base style overrides defining global OKLCH color tokens and dark-mode variants.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Switches between SplashPage and RoseDayPage based on user entry state.
frontend/src/components/FallingRoses.tsx: Generates and animates falling rose emojis with timed cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages creation and caching of authenticated or anonymous backend actors using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, login handling, and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder hook file for future query usage.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles, fonts, Rose Day theme, and animations for splash and greeting pages.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root and wraps the app with query and identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/RoseDayPage.tsx: Main greeting page with animated roses, message card, and decorative layout.
frontend/src/pages/SplashPage.tsx: Splash screen prompting entry via click or keyboard to trigger onEnter.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, and container settings with several UI extensions.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, features, and requirements for building a two-step Rose Day greeting web experience with animations.
